CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Case_Type_Config__c, 'Retain Withdrawal'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - Agree to Cancel Withdrawal'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - With Reduction Withdrawal Amount'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - Others') ) ) , 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Total Retain Withdrawal
